scripts.postinstall: npm install --prefix LumosApp && npm install --prefix LumosTrade && npm install --prefix LumosCLI
scripts.build:all: npm run expand-env && npm run build:lumostrade && npm run build:lumosapp && npm run build:lumoscli
scripts.build:lumostrade: tsc -p LumosTrade/tsconfig.json && mkdir -p LumosTrade/dist/config LumosTrade/config && cp -R LumosTrade/config/* LumosTrade/dist/config/ || true && cp -R LumosTrade/config/* LumosTrade/config/ || true
scripts.build:lumosapp: tsc -p LumosApp/tsconfig.json && mkdir -p LumosApp/dist/views LumosApp/dist/templates LumosApp/dist/public && cp LumosApp/src/views/*.ejs LumosApp/dist/views/ || true && cp LumosApp/src/templates/*.ejs LumosApp/dist/views/ || true && cp LumosApp/src/templates/*.ejs LumosApp/dist/templates/ || true && cp -R LumosApp/src/public/* LumosApp/dist/public/ || true
